Headline: #12 Roosevelt Temporary Reroute at Central/Harrison
ShortDescription: 12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted via Harrison, Laramie and Roosevelt due to, street blockage near Central/Harrison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Harrison, Laramie and Roosevelt due to, street blockage near Central/Harrison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Reroute at 75th/Eberhart
ShortDescription: 75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th,King Drive,76th,Cottage Grove,and 75th due to,street blockage near 75th/Eberhart.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th,King Drive,76th,Cottage Grove,and 75th due to,street blockage near 75th/Eberhart.
